title: High ping every 1 minute
body:
Hey. 
Since 3 days i have a massive problem. My ping goes up to 300 for 2 seconds ingame each ~1 minute..
In this time i teleport ingame, and can´t play..
My ping in teamspeak is always low (i looked at it when i have the minilag ingame), so it´s only in the game..
I restarted my router several times.
What can i do?
Anyone else with this problem?
Thank you :)

Regards

replies.body: It sounds like even with solid ping there are some issues holding a strong connection with the game server, which can happen from factors like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case to see what's going on.  Let me know what you find!
